TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Yuluw, title = Yuluw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuluw} }

S.FORM: Yuluw Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Yuluw a niyaro', 44 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 163 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 159 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal91%, Paiwan2%, Bunun1%, Truku1%, roma10%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Yolow Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Yolow a niyaro', 44 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 163 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 159 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal91%, Paiwan2%, Bonon1%, Troko1%, roma10%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
